author: Steve Bowman
title: Steve Bowman
text: The service from both your sales and customer support staffs for my recent purchase of our Barcalounger Encore home theater seating was so exceptional that I decided it merited acknowledgement. Alex was both knowledgeable and helpful without being pushy while helping me decide what products would best suit our needs. John Jasso has provided customer service that has easily been some of the best that I have ever experienced. They completely exceeded my expectations during every step of the process and we couldn't be happier. It is refreshing to find a company these days that clearly places customer satisfaction at the top of their list of priorities.
